text: Perho is a municipality in Central Ostrobothnia, Finland. About 2,930 people lived there in January 2014. The municipalities next to it are Alajärvi, Halsua, Kinnula, Kivijärvi, Kyyjärvi, Lestijärvi, Veteli and Vimpeli. Perho was established in 1868. == Distances == * Kyyjärvi 23 km * Kivijärvi 40 km * Kinnula 43 km * Halsua 40 km * Veteli 45 km * Karstula 49 km * Kaustinen 55 km * Alajärvi 65 km * Äänekoski 110 km * Haapajärvi 118 km == Other websites == * Category:Municipalities of Central Ostrobothnia Category:1868 establishments in Finland
title: Perho
